name: Astro-Cat
description:
Title: Astro-Cat
Creator: Chloe Flores
Platform: Unity
Genre: 2D Pixel Puzzle
Rating: E
Game Overview: Oh no! Astro-Cat has suffered major ship damage and must fix it before flying back home to Planet Yarn
Published/Updated Date: 2/23/2021
Instructions: Fix the broken ship by walking using WASD/Arrow keys and pressing E to interact with objects.
